operations.notes:
This method retrieves all Resource Group values that are associated with the account with which the requesting User is associated. A Resource Group is simply a grouping of Resource data values. Resource Groups are used for determining the Allocation Relationship between a User Group and the resources within the Resource Group.

The requesting User must have the following rights to perform this task:

RightsRequired
AuthRuleType.MANAGE_ALLOCATIONS ALWAYS

This operation returns a Resource Group Wrapper with the following attributes:

Name Data Type Description
resourceGroups List of Resource Group values. List of all Resource Groups within the Forum with which the calling User is currently associated.

responseMessages.message:
Unauthorized Request

The application returns an Unauthorized Request response in the following cases:

  • Authentication Exception if the requestor cannot be authenticated using the provided Authentication token.
  • Authorization Exception if the requestor identified by the Authorization token is not authorized to perform this action.

Unrecoverable Error

A System Exception if an returned if the operation has caused an unrecoverable state.

parameters.description: The Resource Group value to create
parameters.name: _group

operations.notes:
Creates a new resource group. A Resource Group is simply a grouping of Resource data values. Resource Groups are used for determining the Allocation Relationship between a User Group and the resources within the Resource Group.

The requesting User must have the following rights to perform this task:

RightsRequired
AuthRuleType.MANAGE_ALLOCATIONS ALWAYS

This operation requires a Resource Group value.

This operation returns a Resource Group value.

responseMessages.message:
Unauthorized Request

The application returns an Unauthorized Request response in the following cases:

  • Authentication Exception if the requestor cannot be authenticated using the provided Authentication token.
  • Authorization Exception if the requestor identified by the Authorization token is not authorized to perform this action.

Invalid Resource Group Data

If the Resource Group value provided is invalid, the following exceptions may be thrown:

Duplicate Exception if the Group Resource Name is not unique in the Forum.

Resource Group Exception if any of the group members point to invalid Resources.

Unrecoverable Error

A System Exception if an returned if the operation has caused an unrecoverable state.

parameters.description: The Resource Group to update, with all changes made to the Resource Group value other than the resource group sysid value.
parameters.name: _group

operations.notes:
Updates an existing resource group as identified by the Sysid of the Resource Group value passed as the body to this end point. A Resource Group is simply a grouping of Resource data values. Resource Groups are used for determining the Allocation Relationship between a user and the resources within the Resource Group.

The requesting User must have the following rights to perform this task:

RightsRequired
AuthRuleType.MANAGE_ALLOCATIONS ALWAYS

This operation requires a Resource Group value.

This operation returns a Resource Group value.

responseMessages.message:
Unauthorized Request

The application returns an Unauthorized Request response in the following cases:

  • Authentication Exception if the requestor cannot be authenticated using the provided Authentication token.
  • Authorization Exception if the requestor identified by the Authorization token is not authorized to perform this action.

Resource Group not Found

If the Resource Group provided cannot be found in the system, the following exception is returned:

Not Found Exception if the Resource Group matching the provided group cannot be found.

Invalid Resource Group Data

If the Resource Group value provided is invalid, the following exceptions may be returned:

Duplicate Exception if the Group Resource Name is not unique in the Forum.

Resource Group Exception if any of the group members point to invalid Resources.

Unrecoverable Error

A System Exception if an returned if the operation has caused an unrecoverable state.

operations.notes:
This operation updates the POSTed collection of Resource Groups to include the identified resource as a member. Those Resource Groups to which the resource currently belongs which are not included in the POSTed collection of Resource Group SYSID values to which the resource should belong will remove the resource as a member.

The User must have one of the following rights to perform this task:

RightsRequired
AuthRuleType.MANAGE_RESOURCES_NON_ALLOC CONDITIONAL
AuthRuleType.MANAGE_RESOURCES CONDITIONAL

This operation requires a Resource Groups Resource Criteria value which includes the following fields:

Name Data Type Required Description
resourceGroupSysids Array of Numeric SYSID values ALWAYS Array of Resource Group SYSID integer values to which the identified resource will be added.

responseMessages.message:
Unauthorized Request

The application returns an Unauthorized Request response in the following cases:

  • Authentication Exception if the requestor cannot be authenticated using the provided Authentication token.
  • Authorization Exception if the requestor identified by the Authorization token is not authorized to perform this action.

Resource Group Not Found

If the Resource Group requested cannot be found, the following exception is returned:

Not Found Exception if the Resource Group cannot be found.

Unrecoverable Error

A System Exception if an returned if the operation has caused an unrecoverable state.

parameters.description: {@link ResourceGroupsCriteria} object with search criteria valus.
parameters.name: _criteria

operations.notes:
Searches the Resource Groups within the schema forum of the requesting user for those resource groups which match the criteria provided in the posted value.

The requesting User must have at least one of the following rights to perform this task:

RightsRequired
AuthRuleType.MANAGE_ALLOCATIONS CONDITIONAL
AuthRuleType.MANAGE_RESOURCES CONDITIONAL
AuthRuleType.MANAGE_RESOURCES_NON_ALLOC CONDITIONAL

This operation requires a Resource Groups Criteria value.

This operation returns a Resource Groups Results value.

responseMessages.message:
Unauthorized Request

The application returns an Unauthorized Request response in the following cases:

  • Authentication Exception if the requestor cannot be authenticated using the provided Authentication token.
  • Authorization Exception if the requestor identified by the Authorization token is not authorized to perform this action.

Unrecoverable Error

A System Exception if an returned if the operation has caused an unrecoverable state.

parameters.description: Integer SYSID of the Resource Group to which the identified resources will be added
parameters.name: sysidResourceGroup

parameters.description: Resource Groups Criteria Object which identifies which Resources to add to the identified Resource Group
parameters.name: _criteria

operations.notes:
Adds one or more Resources identified by the PUT Criteria value into the Resource Group identified by the sysidResourceGroup path parameter. A Resource Group is simply a grouping of Resource data values. Resource Groups are used for determining the Allocation Relationship between a User Group and the resources within the Resource Group.

The requesting User must have the following rights to perform this task:

RightsRequired
AuthRuleType.MANAGE_ALLOCATIONS ALWAYS

This operation requires a Resource Groups Resource Criteria value.

This operation returns a Resource Group value with the newly added resource member.

responseMessages.message:
Unauthorized Request

The application returns an Unauthorized Request response in the following cases:

  • Authentication Exception if the requestor cannot be authenticated using the provided Authentication token.
  • Authorization Exception if the requestor identified by the Authorization token is not authorized to perform this action.

Resource Group not Found

If the Resource Group identified cannot be found in the system, the following exception is returned:

Not Found Exception if the Resource Group cannot be found.

Unrecoverable Error

A System Exception if an returned if the operation has caused an unrecoverable state.

parameters.description: Integer SYSID of the Resource Group from which the identified resources will be removed
parameters.name: sysidResourceGroup

parameters.description: Resource Groups Criteria Object which identifies which Resources to add to the identified Resource Group
parameters.name: _criteria

operations.notes:
Removes one or more Resources identified by the POSTed Criteria value from the Resource Group identified by the sysidResourceGroup path parameter. A Resource Group is simply a grouping of Resource data values. Resource Groups are used for determining the Allocation Relationship between a User Group and the resources within the Resource Group.

This operation requires a Resource Groups Resource Criteria value.

This operation returns a Resource Group value with the removed resource members.

responseMessages.message:
Unauthorized Request

The application returns an Unauthorized Request response in the following cases:

  • Authentication Exception if the requestor cannot be authenticated using the provided Authentication token.
  • Authorization Exception if the requestor identified by the Authorization token is not authorized to perform this action.

Resource Group not Found

If the Resource Group identified cannot be found in the system, the following exception is returned:

Not Found Exception if the Resource Group cannot be found.

Unrecoverable Error

A System Exception if an returned if the operation has caused an unrecoverable state.

parameters.description: Integer SYSID of the resource group to retrieve
parameters.name: sysid

operations.notes:
Gets the resource group identified by sysid value passed as a path parameter to this end point. A Resource Group is simply a grouping of Resource data values. Resource Groups are used for determining the Allocation Relationship between a User Group and the resources within the Resource Group.

The requesting User must have the following rights to perform this task:

RightsRequired
AuthRuleType.MANAGE_ALLOCATIONS ALWAYS

This operation returns a Resource Group value.

Unauthorized Request

The application returns an Unauthorized Request response in the following cases:

  • Authentication Exception if the requestor cannot be authenticated using the provided Authentication token.
  • Authorization Exception if the requestor identified by the Authorization token is not authorized to perform this action.

Resource Group Not Found

If the Resource Group requested cannot be found, the following exception is returned:

Not Found Exception if the Resource Group cannot be found.

Unrecoverable Error

A System Exception if an returned if the operation has caused an unrecoverable state.

parameters.description: Integer SYSID of the resource group to delete
parameters.name: sysid

operations.notes: Deletes an existing resource group as identified by the Resource Group sysid passed as a path parameter. Those resources assigned to the resource group are not affected by the removal of the resource group. User Group Allocations that are defined for the deleted resource group no longer apply.

responseMessages.message:
Unauthorized Request

The application returns an Unauthorized Request response in the following cases:

  • Authentication Exception if the requestor cannot be authenticated using the provided Authentication token.
  • Authorization Exception if the requestor identified by the Authorization token is not authorized to perform this action.

Resource Group not Found

If the Resource Group identified cannot be found in the system, the following exception is returned:

Not Found Exception if the Resource Group cannot be found.

Unrecoverable Error

A System Exception if an returned if the operation has caused an unrecoverable state.
